### Exercise

```{r}

data <- 
  read_csv("https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/ST2304/2019v/Week6/SimRegression.csv")

data_long <- data |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("y"),
    names_to = "y_variable",
    values_to = "y_value"
  ) |> 
  select(-x7)

data_long_split <- split(data_long, data_long$y_variable)

models <- map(
  .x = data_long_split, 
  .f = ~ lm(y_value ~ x, data = .x)
)

```

### Box Cox

```{r}

library(MASS)

data <- tibble(
  x = 1:50,
  y = rnorm(50, 0.1 * x, 1)^2
)

boxcox(
  lm(y ~ x, data = data)
)
```
